channel.title: Elko County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Elko County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 298
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 298 - NV-535/Elko West. The NV-535 shield was added to the Exit 298 freeway junction in 2021. Prior to that the text read Elko West without any route markers.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 280 Offramp at NV-766
item.description: I-80 east Exit 280 offramp at NV-766. NV-766 heads north to Newmont Gold Mine, south into Carlin.

item.title: End NV-228 North at NV-227
item.description: End NV-228 North at NV-227 in Spring Creek. Use NV-227 West for Elko; NV-227 East for Lamoille.

item.title: End NV-228 North At NV-227
item.description: End NV-228 North At NV-227 in Spring Creek.

item.title: NV-228 North - Jiggs
item.description: Entering Jiggs (Elevation 5476 Feet) on NV-228 North

item.title: Begin NV-228 Northbound
item.description: Begin NV-228 Northbound in Jiggs

item.title: US-93 South - Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome to Nevada on US-93 south, at the Idaho-Nevada border.

item.title: BL-80/NV-535 West Approaching NV-225
item.description: BL-80/NV-535 West (Idaho Street) approaching NV-225 North (Mountain City Highway and Silver St.). Use NV-225 north (Mountain City Highway) to Boise (Idaho). Continue west on BL-80/NV-535 to Elko West. Turn left for Silver St.

item.title: BL-80/NV-535 West Approaching NV-225/To I-80
item.description: BL-80/NV-535 (Idaho St.) approaching NV-225/ To I-80 (Mountain City Highway) in Elko. The sign shows NV-225 straight ahead, but it should have a right arrow.

item.title: BL-80/NV-535 West - Idaho St.
item.description: BL-80/NV-535 West/To I-80 on Idaho St. in Elko.

item.title: NV-227 West Approaching Roundabout in Spring Creek
item.description: NV-227 West approaching Licht Parkway and Spring Creek Parkway roundabout in Spring Creek.

item.title: NV-227 North at BL-80/NV-535 (Idaho St.)
item.description: NV-227 North (5th St.) at BL-80/NV-535 (Idaho St.) in Elko. Use BL-80/NV-535 West for NV-225; use BL-80 for I-80.

item.title: BL-80/NV-223 East At 6th St.
item.description: BL-80/NV-223 east (Humboldt Ave.) at 6th St in Wells. Turn right to continue east on BL-80/NV-223 and for I-80/US-93. This is the only NV-223 shield that I have seen in Wells. Most of the route is signed with a BL-80 shield.

item.title: BL-80 - Wells
item.description: BL-80 shield along Humboldt Ave. in Wells

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 351 Offramp at BL-80/NV-223
item.description: I-80 West - Exit 351 Offramp at BL-80/NV-223 (Humboldt Ave.) in Wells. Turn right for BL-80 West/NV-223 to Wells; left for Angel Lake. This is the western end of the Wells business loop.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 352A
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 352A - US-93/East Wells.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 352B
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 352B - East Wells.

item.title: I-80 West - Pacific Time Zone
item.description: Entering Pacific Time Zone on I-80 West/Alt. US-93 North. The city of West Wendover, Nevada observes Mountain Time as it is located on the Utah border. The time zone boundary on I-80 is just west of West Wendover.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 407
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 407 - Ola. Use Exit 407 for access to West Wendover.

item.title: US-93 Alt/BL-80 West at I-80/US-93 Alt Onramp
item.description: US-93 Alt/BL-80 West at I-80 West/US-93 Alt. North onramp (Exit 410) - in West Wendover.

item.title: BL-80 West at I-80 West (Exit 410)
item.description: BL-80 West at I-80 West (Exit 410) to Elko.

item.title: I-80 West (Exit 360) Onramp
item.description: I-80 West Onramp at Exit 360 in Elko County.

item.title: NV-225 North - Mountain Time
item.description: Entering Mountain Time Zone on NV-225 north, approaching the Idaho state line. The official time zone boundary is the Nevada-Idaho state line, but the towns of Owyhee and Mountain City, NV both observe Mountain Time.

item.title: NV-225 North - Brand Inspection Required
item.description: Brand Inspection Required on Livestock Leaving Nevada on NV-225 north.

item.title: NV-226 North - Tuscarora Junction
item.description: NV-226 North at Tuscarora junction

item.title: NV-766 North at I-80 West
item.description: NV-766 North at I-80 West to Reno. Continue north for NV-766/Newmont Mine Road.

item.title: 10th St. North at Chestnut St.
item.description: 10th St. northbound at Chestnut St. (BL-80/NV-221) in Carlin. Use westbound Chestnut St. for NV-278. Continue north on 10th St. (NV-766) for I-80.

item.title: Bush St. West at NV-278
item.description: Bush St. West at NV-278 in Carlin. This is an unusual cutout style Nevada state highway shield, that looks more like the style on guide signs.

item.title: NV-225 South - Trail Creek Road
item.description: NV-225 south at Trail Creek Road to Maggie Summit

item.title: NV-225 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-225 south. Distance to Elko, Carlin (via I-80), and Eureka (via I-80 and NV-278).

item.title: End NV-226 North
item.description: End NV-226 North in Elko County. Turn left for Owyhee and Wilson Reservoir; turn right for Mountain City and Bull Run Reservoir. Either road is unpaved.

item.title: NV-225 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-225 north. Distance to Mountain Home (Idaho) and Boise (Idaho). This is the last distance marker northbound on NV-225 in Nevada.

item.title: NV-225 North Approaching NV-226
item.description: NV-225 North approaching NV-226 - Tuscarora Junction.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 301 Offramp
item.description: I-80 West Exit 301 offramp at NV-225. Turn left for NV-225 North to Boise (Idaho); left for NV-225 South to Elko.

item.title: BL-80 East at I-80 West
item.description: BL-80 East at I-80 West (Exit 303). Turn left for I-80 west to Reno.

item.title: BL-80 East at I-80
item.description: BL-80 East at I-80 (Exit 303) in Elko.

item.title: BL-80 East at I-80 (Exit 303)
item.description: BL-80 East at I-80 (Exit 303) in Elko. Turn right for I-80 east to Salt Lake City (UT); continue under freeway for I-80 west to Reno.

item.description: BL-80 East (Idaho St.) at Jennings Way to I-80. Turn left for Jennings Way and I-80 onramps.

item.title: BL-80 East (Idaho St.) Approaching I-80
item.description: BL-80 East (Idaho St.) approaching I-80 to Salt Lake (UT) and Reno.

item.title: I-80 West Exit 303 Offramp
item.description: I-80 West Exit 303 Offramp at BL-80. Turn left for BL-80 (Jennings Way).

item.description: I-80 west at Exit 303 - Elko East.

item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 303. Use Exit 303 for BL-80 Business Loop.

item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 303 - Elko East.

item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 310 - Osino.

item.description: I-80 west approaching Check Station. All Commercial Vehicles Must Exit.

item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 314 - Ryndon/Devils Gate

item.description: I-80 west at Exit 317 - Elburz

item.description: I-80 West approaching Exit 317 - Elburz

item.description: Distance marker on I-80 west. Distance to Elko, Carlin, and Reno.

item.description: End NV-229 North at I-80 West (Exit 321).

item.description: End NV-229 North at I-80 (Exit 321). Use I-80 east for Wells; I-80 west for Elko.

item.description: NV-229 north at Starr Valley junction

item.description: NV-229 South at NV-767 in Elko County. Turn left to continue south on NV-229 and for US-93.

item.title: End NV-767 North at NV-229
item.description: End NV-767 North at NV-229. Turn right for NV-229 South to Ely (via US-93 South) and Wells (via US-93 North). Continue straight for NV-229 North to Elko (via I-80 West).

item.title: Harrison Pass Road South at County Road
item.description: Harrison Pass Road South at County Road to Eureka and Bald Mountain Mine. Continue east for Ruby Valley.

item.description: Harrison Pass Road at county road to Railroad Pass and Overland Pass. Use Harrison Pass Road for Harrison Pass and Ruby Valley NWR.

item.description: End NV-226 North in Elko County. Turn left for Owyhee and Wilson Reservoir; turn right for Mountain City and Bull Run Reservoir. Either road is unpaved.

item.title: Owyhee Road at Airport Road - Duck Valley Indian Reservation
item.description: Owyhee Road at Airport Road in the Duck Valley Indian Reservation. Merge left to continue on Owyhee Road towards Sheep Creek (Reservoir). Use Airport Road for Owyhee Airport and Billy Shaw (Reservoir).

item.description: NV-225 south at Owyhee Road to Owyhee Airport. Continue on NV-225 for Mountain City and Elko.

item.description: US-93 Alt. South approaching Blue Lake Junction. Blue Lake is a popular spot for scuba divers.

item.description: Next Gas 130 MPH on Alt. US-93 South. This sign is not correct, as the next gas is in McGill which is 107 miles.

item.description: Speed limit 70 MPH on Alt. US-93 South leaving West Wendover. Distance marker to Jct. US-93 and Ely.

item.description: US-93 Alt. South shield on the road out of West Wendover.

item.description: Elko County Line on Alt. US-93 North. The Elko County sign was damaged and hanging vertically from the post.

item.description: US-93 Alt. South/BL-80 East at Wendover Blvd. Turn left on Wendover Blvd. for Wendover and Ely and to continue on US-93 Alt. and BL-80.

item.description: US-93 Alt. South at I-80 East Onramp to Salt Lake (Utah).

item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 410. Use Exit 410 for BL-80/Business Loop and Nevada Welcome Center.

item.description: I-80 East - Wendover Next 2 Exits. The salt flats are in the background of the photo.

item.description: West Wendover - Next 2 Exits on I-80 east.

item.description: Pilot Peak interchange (Exit 398) at I-80 East/Alt. US-93 South in Elko County.

item.description: Pilot Peak interchange (Exit 398) at I-80 East/Alt. US-93 South in Elko County.

item.title: US-93 North at BL-80 and NV-233
item.description: US-93 North at BL-80 and NV-233. Turn left on BL-80/NV-233 for Wells and the Emigrant Trail Center. Continue north on US-93 for Jackpot and Twin Falls (Idaho).

item.title: US-93 North at I-80 West
item.description: US-93 north at I-80 west (Exit 352). Turn right for I-80 west to Elko. Continue straight for US-93 north to Twin Falls (Idaho).

item.description: US-93 north at I-80 (Exit 352). Use I-80 east for Salt Lake. Use I-80 west for Elko. Continue north on US-93 for Twin Falls.

item.description: NV-229 north in Elko County.

item.description: End NV-229 South at US-93. Use US-93 south for Ely; US-93 north for Wells.

item.title: US-93 North - Elko County
item.description: Entering Elko County on US-93 north. Elko County is the fourth largest county by area in the lower 48 states.

item.title: NV-766 North at I-80 (Exit 280)
item.description: NV-766 north at I-80 (Exit 280). Use I-80 east for Elko; I-80 west for Reno; NV-766 north for Newmont Mine Road.

item.title: 10th St. North at Chestnut St.
item.description: 10th St. northbound at Chestnut St. (BL-80/NV-221) in Carlin. Use westbound Chestnut St. for NV-278. Continue north on 10th St. (NV-766) for I-80.

item.description: NV-278 north at BL-80/NV-221. Continue north on NV-278 for I-80 junction.

item.title: NV-278 North at BL-80/NV-221. Approaching I-80.
item.description: NV-278 at BL-80/NV-221 east to Carlin. Immediately after this intersection is the onramp for I-80 to Reno and Elko. This interchange was recently upgraded from a partial diamond to a full diamond that now has an eastbound ramp onto the freeway.

item.description: NV-278 North approaching NV-221 (BL-80) in Carlin.

item.description: NV-278 north at Bush St. Non truck traffic can enter Carlin on Bush Street. Truck traffic needs to continue north on NV-278 to the business loop.

item.description: Elko County Line on NV-278 north.

item.description: Entering Mountain Time Zone on NV-225 north, approaching the Idaho state line. The official time zone boundary is the Nevada-Idaho state line, but the towns of Owyhee and Mountain City, NV both observe Mountain Time.

item.title: NV-225 North - Entering Duck Valley Reservation
item.description: Entering the Duck Valley Indian Reservation on NV-225 north. The Duck Valley Indian Reservation is located on the Idaho-Nevada border and is home to the Shoshone-Paiute Tribe.

item.description: Entering Mountain City on NV-225 North. Elevation 5,609 Feet.

item.description: NV-225 north at I-80 West (Exit 301).

item.description: Next Services 70 Miles on NV-229 south.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 321
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 321 - NV-229/Halleck/Ruby Valley.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 328
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 328 - River Ranch.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 328
item.description: I-80 West approaching Exit 328 - River Ranch

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 333
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 333 - Deeth/Starr Valley.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 333
item.description: I-80 West approaching Exit 333 - Deeth/Starr Valley.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 343
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 343 - Welcome/Starr Valley.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 343
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 343 - Welcome/Starr Valley.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 348
item.description: I-80 West at Exit 348 - Beverly Hills. This exit was formerly titled Crested Acres.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 352A
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 352A - US-93/East Wells.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 352B
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 352B - East Wells.

item.title: I-80 West - Business Loop
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 352A. This is the eastern end of the Wells business loop. Typically business loops are not posted on the main exit assembly in Nevada, rather they are on signs like this before the interchange.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 352B
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 352A - East Wells.

item.title: I-80 West - Exits 352A-B
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exits 352A-B - US-93/East Wells.

item.title: I-80 West - Wells Next 3 Exits
item.description: I-80 west approaching Wells. Use next 3 exits for Wells.

item.title: End NV-233 South at I-80 (Exit 378)
item.description: End NV-233 south at I-80 (Exit 378). Use I-80 west for Wells; I-80 east for Wendover.

item.title: NV-233 West - Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome to Nevada - The Silver State on NV-233 west. Taken at the Utah-Nevada state line.

item.title: BL-80 East - West Wendover
item.description: BL-80 east shield along Wendover Blvd. in West Wendover.

item.title: BL-80 East at Alt. US-93 South
item.description: BL-80 East/Alt. US-93 South (Wendover Blvd.) at Alt. US-93 south to Ely. Continue straight for BL-80 east to Wendover (Utah).

item.title: Wendover Blvd. at BL-80/Alt. US-93 Jct.
item.description: Wendover Blvd. east at BL-80/Alt. US-93 jct. Turn left for BL-80 West/Alt. US-93 North to I-80. Continue straight on Wendover Blvd. for BL-80 East/Alt. US-93 South.

item.title: US-93 North - Mile Marker
item.description: This is an unusual mile marker on US-93 north in Nevada. Typical mile markers in Nevada are much smaller and do not have a shield outline on them, just a text description of the route. There are two or there on this stretch of road between Wells and Lages Junction.

item.title: US-93 North - Elko County
item.description: Entering Elko County on US-93 north. Elko County is the fourth largest county by area in the lower 48 states.

item.title: US-93 North - Entering Jackpot and Mountain Time
item.description: Entering Mountain Time Zone and Jackpot on US-93 north. Most of Nevada is on Pacific Time, except for a few of the border towns, bordering states in Mountain Time. Jackpot is on the border with Idaho.

item.title: US-93 North - Contact
item.description: Entering Contact on US-93 north. The only thing in Contact is a Nevada DOT Highway Maintenance Station.

item.title: US-93 North - H-D Summit
item.description: US-93 north at H-D Summit - Elevation 6,280. The overpass in the background is a recently installed wildlife crossing over the highway. H-D Summit is the northern end of the Great Basin on US-93. North of here all water flows into the Snake River system.

item.title: US-93 North at I-80 West
item.description: US-93 north at I-80 west (Exit 352). Turn right for I-80 west to Elko. Continue straight for US-93 north to Twin Falls (Idaho).

item.title: US-93 North at I-80
item.description: US-93 north at I-80 (Exit 352). Turn right for I-80 east; continue under the underpass for I-80 west.

item.title: US-93 North at I-80
item.description: US-93 north at I-80 (Exit 352). Use I-80 east for Salt Lake. Use I-80 west for Elko. Continue north on US-93 for Twin Falls.

item.title: US-93 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-93 north to Wells, Wilkins (Site), and Twin Falls. Taken just north of NV-232 junction.

item.title: US-93 North at NV-232
item.description: US-93 north at NV-232 (unsigned northbound) to Clover Valley.

item.title: US-93 North at NV-229
item.description: US-93 north at NV-229.

item.title: US-93 North at NV-229
item.description: US-93 north at NV-229. Turn right on NV-229 for Ruby Lake National Wildlife Refuge.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching NV-229
item.description: US-93 north approaching NV-229 north to Ruby Valley.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching NV-229
item.description: US-93 north approaching NV-229.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching NV-229
item.description: US-93 north approaching NV-229 junction.

item.title: US-93 North - Elko County
item.description: Entering Elko County on US-93 north. Elko County is the fourth largest county by area in the lower 48 states.

item.title: BL-80 West/Alt. US-93 North at I-80
item.description: BL-80 West/Alt. US-93 North at I-80 onramps. Alt. US-93 north joins I-80 west to Wells.

item.title: BL-80 West/Alt. US-93 North - To I-80
item.description: BL-80 West/Alt. US-93 North on Wendover Blvd. at access road to I-80.

item.title: BL-80 West at Alt. US-93
item.description: BL-80 west at Alt. US-93. Continue west on BL-80 and Alt. US-93 for I-80. Alt. US-93 follows I-80 west from here to Wells.

item.title: BL-80 West at Alt. US-93
item.description: BL-80 west at Alt. US-93. Use Alt. US-93 South for Ely. Alt. US-93 joins BL-80 west towards I-80 and Elko.

item.title: I-80 East - Utah State Line
item.description: Utah State Line on I-80 east at the Utah-Nevada border. A fancier welcome sign is just east of here. The Utah-Nevada border along I-80 is home to the twin towns of Wendover (Utah) and West Wendover (Nevada). The Nevada side has many large casinos.

item.title: I-80 East - Entering Mountain Time Zone
item.description: Entering Mountain Time Zone on I-80 east, just before the Nevada-Utah state line.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 410
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 410 - US-93 Alt./West Wendover/Ely. This is the last exit in Nevada on I-80 east. This exit is the western end of the West Wendover/Wendover business loop. The casinos in West Wendover and the salt flats beyond are visible.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 407
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 407 - Ola.

item.title: I-80 East - West Wendover Exits
item.description: West Wendover - Next 2 Exits on I-80 east.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 398
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 398 - Pilot Peak.

item.title: I-80 East - Silverzone Pass
item.description: I-80 east at Silverzone Pass - Elevation 5,940 Feet.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 387
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 387 - Shafter.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 387
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 387 - Shafter.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 378
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 378 - NV-233/Oasis/Montello

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 376
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 376 - Pequop

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 373
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 373 - Summit. Access to Rest Area. Summit refers to Pequop Summit.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 365
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 365 - Independence Valley.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 360
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 360 - Moor.

item.title: US-93 South - Pacific Time
item.description: Entering Pacific Time on US-93 south. Almost all of Nevada is on Pacific Time, except for a few of the border towns, Jackpot included.

item.title: US-93 South - Jackpot
item.description: Entering Jackpot on US-93 south. Jackpot lies right on the Idaho-Nevada border, and is home to several casinos.

item.title: US-93 South - Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome to Nevada on US-93 south, at the Idaho-Nevada border.

item.title: US-93 South at NV-229
item.description: US-93 south at NV-229 in Elko County.

item.title: US-93 South Approaching NV-229
item.description: US-93 south approaching NV-229 west to Ruby Valley.

item.title: US-93 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-93 south. Distance to Jct. SR-229, Currie, and Ely.

item.title: Welcome To Nevada - NV-225 South
item.description: Welcome to Nevada on NV-225 south. Elko County Nevada Postmile marker as well.

item.title: Welcome To Nevada - NV-225 South
item.description: Welcome to Nevada on NV-225 south. Elko County Nevada Postmile marker as well.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - ID-51 North
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on ID-51 north. Taken on Idaho’s only highway crossing with Nevada.

item.title: NV-225 North - Entering Owyhee
item.description: Entering Owyhee, Nevada on NV-225 north. Elevation 5400 feet. Owyhee is on the Duck Valley Indian Reservation.

item.title: NV-225 North At Gold Creek/Jarbidge Jct
item.description: NV-225 north at the Gold Creek/Jarbidge Junction. Jarbidge, NV is one of the most isolated towns in the lower 48.

item.title: End NV-226 at NV-225
item.description: End NV-226 east at NV-225. NV-225 goes north to Owyhee, and south to Elko.

item.title: End NV-226 at NV-225
item.description: End NV-226 east at NV-225 at Tuscarora Junction.

item.title: NV-226 West at Tuscarora Junction.
item.description: Begin NV-226 west at Tuscarora Junction.

item.title: NV-225 North Approaching NV-226
item.description: NV-225 north to Mountain City approaching NV-226 west to Tuscarora.

item.title: NV-225 North Approaching Tuscarora Jct.
item.description: NV-225 north approaching NV-226 at Tuscarora Junction. Nevada often gives names to its rural highway junctions.

item.title: NV-225 North at I-80 West Exit 301
item.description: NV-225 north at I-80 West/Exit 301 onramp.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 301 Offramp at NV-225
item.description: I-80 east Exit 301 offramp at NV-225 north to Boise (ID) and south to Elko.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 301
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 301 - NV-225/Elko/Downtown. NV-225 connects Elko with Mountain Home, Idaho via ID-51.

item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 301 - NV-225/Elko/Downtown.

item.description: I-80 east at Exit 298 - Elko West.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 298 - Business Loop

item.description: End NV-766 (10th St) at NV-221/To NV-228 (Chestnut St). These Nevada route shields do not contain the word Nevada.

item.description: I-80 east Exit 280 offramp at NV-766. NV-766 heads north to Newmont Gold Mine, south into Carlin.
